page.title: 07A TYPICAL DAY
page.content: {A Typical Day} I get up at approximately 7.30am every schoolday.I have a wash,wash my hair then go downstairs.I cook my breakfast,two slices of toast and a cup of coffee,I then set my school-bag for the day ahead.At 8.00am my friend calls for me and we talk about what happened the night before.At 8.15am I call on a boy over the road and we walk to school.We wait at the shop Lanes for our other friends and then we walk the rest of the way to school. After school I wait at Lanes for my friends and then walk home.I reach my house about 4.15pm.I get changed into some much nicer fashionable clothes and go round to my friend's house.After tea at 6.30pm I either go to the Boys Club,Uplands Park or I invite friends into my house.I go to bed around 10.30pm.
